entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:16 PM PDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 01:00 AM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 44 %
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: SSE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
